name: Don't Wash Down
description:
The kittie don't wanna get a wash!!!

  1. Avoid the water in the bottom and the shower in the top of the room,
  2. Dodge the "clean stuff"
  3. Gather score jumping on the falling blocks
  4. ENJOY!!!

Controls (switchable)

Side Move: Left/Right Arrows | "A"/"D"

Jump: Up Arrow | Space | "J" | "Z" | "W"
